pages.text: Vocaris is the school of summoning and conjuration, a force of creation and manifestation. Those who follow Vocaris can summon creatures from other realms, evoke elemental forces, or bind spirits to their service.
The magic of Vocaris is dynamic and diverse, allowing its users to alter the very fabric of reality by bringing forth the elements or creatures to fight in their name.
Evocation requires both mastery over the forces of nature and the ability to control powerful beings. The art is as much about control as it is about creation.
